text: Danish Siddiqui (19 May 1983 â€“ 15 July 2021) was an Indian photojournalist. He received the Pulitzer Prize in 2018. He worked for Reuters. Siddiqui was shot dead while covering a clash between Afghan security forces and Taliban on 15 July 2021, aged 38.
